Replace.Text: 建造者可以建造摩艾石像改良设施。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]摩艾石像提供+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。每2个相邻的摩艾石像+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。在火山土单元格之上或与其相邻时，+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。与海岸或湖泊单元格相邻时，+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。随着市政与科技树的发展，可获得额外的 [ICON_Culture] 文化值与 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩。可建在平原、平原丘陵、草原、草原丘陵或火山土之上。只能建在相邻湖泊或近海的单元格上。

Your Builders can now make Moai improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Moai provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every 2 adjacent Moai. +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture if on or adjacent to a Volcanic Soil tile. +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture if adjacent to a Coast or Lake tile . Additional [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism as you advance through the Civics and Technology Tree. Can be built on Plains, Plains Hills, Grassland, Grassland Hills, or Volcanic Soil. Can only be placed adjacent to a Lake or Coast tile.
从所有 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物中获得的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+100%。
Earn +100% [ICON_Faith] Faith from all [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics.
您通往任何城邦的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线都为起源城市的每个特色区域+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to any city-state provide +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every specialty district in the origin city.
此城中每有1位您所创建（或主流）宗教的信徒，国际与国内 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线提供的 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值便+0.8。
International and domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes receive +0.8 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for every follower in this city, of your founded or majority religion.
城市中每拥有1个“军营”内建筑，购买陆地战斗或支援单位所需的 [ICON_GOLD] 金币便减少20%，若可用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰购买，则费用也减少20%。
Land combat or Support units are 20% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_GOLD] Gold (or [ICON_Faith] Faith if allowed) for each Encampment district building in that city.
对于所有城市，其每拥有一种改良的战略资源，便+5% [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。
+5% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in all cities for each different improved Strategic resource they have.
[ICON_Faith] 信仰值可用来购买市中心建筑和军营区的建筑。购买远古、中世纪、文艺复兴城墙（包括堡垒）的费用降低50%，但只能通过 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买。

City Center buildings and Encampment district buildings can be bought with [ICON_Faith] Faith. Purchasing Ancient, Medieval, and Renaissance Walls (including Tsikhe) is 50% cheaper, but they can only be bought with [ICON_Faith] Faith.
您的国际 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。您通往盟友城市或宗主城邦的[ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线+4 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
Your International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production. Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to an Ally's city or vassal city-state gain +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

每本 [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] 著作巨作+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和+2 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。每件 [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] 雕塑、 [ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] 肖像、 [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] 风景和 [ICON_GreatWork_Religious] 宗教艺术巨作+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和+2 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。每件 [ICON_GreatWork_RELIC] 遗物+3 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。

+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith from each [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Work of Writing, [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work of Sculpture, [ICON_GreatWork_Portrait] Great Work of Portrait, [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Work of Landscape and [ICON_GreatWork_Religious] Great Work of Religious. +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture from each [ICON_GreatWork_RELIC] Relic.
所有的 [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] 著作巨作、[ICON_GreatWork_RELIC] 遗物和 [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] 文物+3 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。
+3 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Work of Writing, [ICON_GreatWork_RELIC] Relic and [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact.
为城市中的每个圣地建筑+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。
+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each Shrine, Temple and Religious building.
每回合提供2份文明已解锁战略资源。
Provides you with 2 of each Strategic resource per turn that you have revealed.
您的建造者现在可以建造大寺改良设施。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、+1 [Icon_Housing] 住房。每与1座学院或圣地区域相邻，则+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值。研究完“科学理论”之后，每与1座学院相邻则额外+1 [Icon_Science] 科技值。必须建在平坦地貌上，不能与其他大寺相邻。

Your Builders can now make Mahavihara improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [Icon_Housing] Housing. +1 [ICON_Science] Science for every adjacent Campus district or Holy Site district. After researching Scientific Theory receive an additional +1 [Icon_Science] Science for every adjacent Campus. Must be built on flat terrain not adjacent to another Mahavihara.
您通往海外城市的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线可从目的地的每个奢侈品资源+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to foreign cities earn +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each Luxury resource at the destination.
您的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线每经过5个单元格，其提供的 [ICON_Gold] 金币便+2。
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes generate +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every 5 tiles they travel.
与海岸或湖泊单元格相邻的区域+4 [ICON_Gold] 金币值。
Your districts on or next to Coast or Lake tiles provide +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
商业中心和港口区域均可为城市提供+1 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度。
+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in cities with a Commercial Hub district.+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in cities with a Harbor district.
您的建造者现在能够建造圆顶市集改良设施。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。每与一个奢侈品资源相邻则+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。起源城市每有一座圆顶市集，对外国际贸易 [ICON_TradeRoute] 路线提供的 [ICON_GOLD] 金币便+2。无法建在另一座圆顶市集旁。

Your Builders can now make Trading Dome improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every adjacent Luxury resource. Your outgoing international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes grant +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold per Trading Dome at the origin. Cannot be built next to another Trading Dome.

建造者现在能够建造修道院改良设施。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]修道院提供+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。此单元格上的友方宗教单位生命值恢复+15（前提是其当前回合未发动攻击）。每1个相邻的区域使其+1 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。解锁“王权神授”市政后每1个相邻的区域使其+2 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。提供+1 [ICON_HOUSING] 住房。解锁“殖民主义”市政后获得额外1点 [ICON_HOUSING] 住房。无法建在另一座修道院旁。

Your Builders can now make Monastery improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Monasteries provide +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. +15 HP healing for friendly religious unit on this tile that has not attacked this turn. +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for every adjacent Districts. +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for every adjacent Districts once Divine Right is discovered. Provides +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing. Receive an additional [ICON_HOUSING] Housing once Colonialism is discovered. Cannot be built next to another Monastery.
您的商人单位对水域单元格的掠夺免疫。不同大陆之间的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线将获得以下加成：通往其他文明的贸易路线获得+6 [ICON_Gold] 金币加成；本国城市间的贸易路线获得+1 [ICON_Food] 食物和+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力加成。

Your Trader units are immune to being plundered on water tiles. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes between multiple continents receive bonus +6 [ICON_Gold] Gold for routes to other civilizations, and bonus +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production for routes between your own cities.
为您的所有城市+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。无论您的城市是否相邻淡水，水源提供的基础 [ICON_Housing] 住房均与相邻淡水时相同。
Your cities gain +1 [ICON_Housing] housing. Your cities have full [ICON_Housing] Housing from water, as if they were all next to a River.
建造者现在能够建造阿卡萨城堡改良设施。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]阿卡萨城堡提供+3 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。提供等于单元格魅力75%的 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。占领单位 [ICON_Strength] 防御力+4，并自动获得2回合防御工事。研究“飞行”科技后可提供 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。无法建在另一座阿卡萨城堡旁。
每个港口内建筑向城市提供3点 [ICON_Power] 电力。
每個港口建築為城市提供+3 [ICON_Power] 電力。
Cities receive +3 [ICON_Power] Power for every Harbor building.
城市中建成的每个军营区域建筑可使城市建造军事单位时加速10%生产速度。
城市中建成的每个军营区域建筑可使城市建造军事单位时增加10%生产速度。
